Text:
Guest:

Jeff Sessions, U.S. Senator from Alabama and member of the Senate Budget Committee
Happy Thanksgiving everyone, and give thanks for the great country we live in (while it's still great).

Thank you!

I'd like to extend an extra Thank You on this day - out here in the American wilderness it is nice to know that there are still people like you who take the time and make the effort to get word out about our once great land.

Take care, and hang in there.  You're a glimmer of light in these darkening days, my friend.
